comments.html: That is for backwards compatibility incase you were to paste the config to an older IOS.
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: This seems to work on most IOS, but I've noticed on Sup720s, 12.2(33)SXH Cisco has added VTY 5 - 15.  Even if you standardized all 16 lines, the configuration still displays vty 0-4 and 5-15 separately.
comments.name: Anonymous
